properties.name: Molten Halls
properties.info: The Molten Halls were once the palace of Akad the Magnificent, an efreet who ruled the area several thousand years ago. In their original state the Molten Halls were a huge, regal complex of basalt rock inlaid with dazzling bronze motifs.

properties.name: Grotto of the Withered Eye
properties.info: A cave system in the hills outside the village of Rythlon, the grotto was a place of power for the witches of the Coven of the Withered Eye. In the rear of the cave system is an entrance to a series of ruined halls, where the coven would conduct foul rituals.
